summary: Provides the core infrastructure for Cython's dataclass feature, defining data structures that capture field specifications and implementing code generation utilities that emit Cython implementations of dataclass special methods such as __init__, __repr__, __eq__, ordering, hashing, and comparison. Includes AST transformations and template handling to integrate generated code into the compiled class.
business_intent: Automate the translation of Python dataclass definitions into efficient Cython class code, eliminating boilerplate and ensuring correct handling of field metadata, type information, and special method generation within the Cython compiler.
